member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.BitmapConversionExtensions.AsBitmap(Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Image{Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Gray{System.Byte}})

Casts an image to an bitmap.
Notice that GDI+ does not support bitmaps which stride is not 4.

member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.BmpSaveExtensions
member.summary: Bitmap file save extensions.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.BmpSaveExtensions.Save(System.Drawing.Image,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Saves the specified image.
Quality parameter is only supported for JPEG, PNG file types. For other file types this value is omitted.
member.param: Quality parameter [0..100] where 0 means maximum compression.
